title: Poetry Post Mapping Project
text: Poetry posts are scattered throughout Portland where neighbors offer us little gifts through poetry: a moment to pause, breathe, and receive inspiration, peace, delight, a new perspective, a sense of connection. We believe poetry posts strengthen our neighborhoods and build community.

title: Poetry Post Mapping Project
text:
The Map
Below are the poetry posts we’ve identified so far. If you’ve found or built a post, you can submit it here.
Last updated: 2024-03-10



Filter by Neighborhood











We want to acknowledge the wonderful community members who have worked in the past to map poetry posts, some of whom are joining this effort. We have the good fortune of learning from and building on their efforts. Our gratitude to Matt B, Sue G, David C, John M, Richard L, Doug G, Tony P, Laurence C, Gus B, Christine T, Ruth L, and no doubt many others!

title: Print a list of posts
text: To print a list of poetry posts in your neighborhood, type your neighborhood(s) of interest into the box below and click the “print” button.

title: Print a list of posts
text: To print a list of poetry posts in your neighborhood, type your neighborhood(s) of interest into the box below and click the “print” button.

title: Share Your Story + Get Involved!
text:
There are many ways to get involved in the Poetry Post Project! 

Share here what you love about poetry posts
Submit here any poetry posts you come across
Spread the word so more people are helping identify posts (share the post submission link with friends, share on social media, other?)
Serve as a neighborhood lead (learn more here)
Donate here to support the project

Contact us to let us know if you are interested in getting involved; we’ll follow up to chat about these and/or other opportunities and ideas you might have!
